name: Gravitic Well
story_text: You bend gravity into a fine point and pull your foes toward it.
targets: Each creature and object in the area

low.conditions: vertical pull 5 toward the center of the area

mid.conditions: vertical pull 7 toward the center of the area

high.conditions: vertical pull 10 toward the center of the area

effect: Targets closest to the center of the area are pulled first.
special_effect: Strained: The size of the area increases by 2. You also target yourself and each ally within distance.
